name: SchallMinorTweaks
title: Schall Minor Tweaks
author: Schallfalke
description:
Various minor tweaks that may improve gameplay.
Options including modifying colour tone for logistics requester chest, character inventory size, grid size of various armours, free circuit wires, stack size of various fuels, player chat colour, research queue availability, remove decoratives, scale of mining drills status light, and more...
